special_abilities.name: Bad Flier
special_abilities.desc: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

actions.description: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.name: Suave Defense
special_abilities.desc: While Amrik is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

actions.description: Amrik makes three dagger attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: Amrik hurls a smoke bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact, creating a cloud of black smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. The area within the cloud is heavily obscured. A strong wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise remains until the end of Amrik's next turn.
actions.name: Smoke Bomb (1/Day)

damage_resistances.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
damage_resistances.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 (8d8) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.description: Zariel attacks twice with her flail and once with Matalotok. She can substitute Horrid Touch for Matalotok.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.
actions.name: Flail

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning, or 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 36 (8d8) fire damage. In addition, the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 (3d6) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.
actions.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)

actions.description: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also blinded and deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Horrid Touch (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.
actions.name: Teleport

name: Arkhan the Cruel
subtitle: Medium humanoid(dragonborn), lawful evil
senses: darkvision 60 ft. (can see invisible creatures out to the same range)

special_abilities.name: Aura of Hate
special_abilities.desc: While Arkhan isn't incapacitated, he and all fiends and undead within 30 feet of him deal 4 extra damage whenever they hit with a melee weapon attack (already factored into Arkhan's attacks). This extra damage is of the same type as the weapon's damage type.

special_abilities.name: Hand of Vecna
special_abilities.desc: The Hand of Vecna has 8 charges and regains 1d4 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. Arkhan can cast the following spells from the hand by expending the specified number of charges (spell save DC 18): finger of death (5 charges), sleep (1 charge), slow (2 charges), and teleport (3 charges).

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Arkhan wields Fane-Eater and wears a suit of Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate. The armor gives Arkhan advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the grappled condition on him.

actions.description: Arkhan makes three weapon attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (1d8 + 12) slashing damage, or 17 (1d10 + 12) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target is a creature and Arkhan rolls a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and Arkhan regains an amount of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
actions.name: Fane-Eater (Battleaxe)

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 4 piercing damage and 9 (2d8) cold damage if the javelin was used to make a melee
actions.name: Javelin

damage_resistances.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
damage_resistances.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Fear Aura
special_abilities.desc: Any creature hostile to Bel that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw, unless Bel is incapacitated. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bel's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Bel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Bel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Bel's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.description: Bel makes three attacks: two with his greatsword and one with his tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that is not being held or worn, it catches fire.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Tail

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The black gauntlet is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): bane, bless, cure wounds, guiding bolt (see "Actions" below)
- 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, hold person, silence
- 3rd level (2 slots): sending, spirit guardians

special_abilities.name: Aura of Terror
special_abilities.desc: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.

special_abilities.name: Tactical Discipline
special_abilities.desc: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.description: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Mace

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
actions.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

special_abilities.name: Adhesive
special_abilities.desc: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is grappled by it (escape DC 10).

special_abilities.name: Death Scream
special_abilities.desc: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet.

actions.description: Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.
actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Gideon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Gideon is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.description: Gideon attacks twice with his fists.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Fist

actions.description: Gideon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Withering Gaze

name: Hellwasp
subtitle: Large fiend, lawful evil
languages: Infernal, telepathy 300 ft. (with other hellwasps only)

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.description: The hellwasp makes two attacks: one with its sting and one with its sword talons.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Sting

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Sword Talons

special_abilities.name: Aura of Invulnerability
special_abilities.desc: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The hollyphant's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Tusks

actions.description: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:
actions.name: Trumpet (3/Day)

actions.description: Each creature in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage.
actions.name: Trumpet of Blasting

actions.description: Creatures in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.
actions.name: Trumpet of Sparkles

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Kostchtchie fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Kostchtchie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: Kostchtchie makes two melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (1d6 + 10) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, or 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 (3d6) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.
actions.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Krull is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): chill touch, mending, resistance, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, detect evil and good, false life, inflict wounds, ray of sickness
- 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, gentle repose, hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spiritual weapon
- 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, magic circle, speak with dead, spirit guardians, vampiric touch
- 4th level (3 slots): banishment, blight, death ward, divination, locate creature
- 5th level (2 slots): antilife shell, cloudkill, contagion, greater restoration
- 6th level (1 slot): create undead, true seeing
- 7th level (1 slot): divine word, regenerate

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Krull can hold his breath for 1 hour.

special_abilities.name: Inescapable Destruction
special_abilities.desc: Necrotic damage dealt by Krull's spells ignores resistance to necrotic damage.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: +1 Maul

actions.description: Krull withdraws into his shell. Until he emerges as a bonus action, he has a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in his shell, Krull is prone, his speed is 0 and can't increase, he has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, he can't take reactions, and the only action he can take is to emerge from his shell.
actions.name: Shell Defense

damage_vulnerabilities.index: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures
damage_vulnerabilities.name: *from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

special_abilities.name: Limited Magic Immunity
special_abilities.desc: Mahadi can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. He has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Mahadi's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.description: Mahadi makes four claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it's a creature. The curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Mahadi summons Ilzabet, an erinyes bound to him by an infernal contract. The erinyes appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of him, acts as his ally, and can't summon other devils. The erinyes remains for 10 minutes or until Mahadi dismisses it as an action. If the erinyes dies, Mahadi loses this action option.
actions.name: Summon Erinyes (1/Day)

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

actions.description: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn.
actions.name: Greatclub

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Heavy Crossbow

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Skull Flail

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claws of the Grave

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action
special_abilities.desc: On each of her turns in combat, Nine-Fingers can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Dagger Thrower
special_abilities.desc: Nine-Fingers adds double her proficiency bonus to the damage she deals on ranged attacks made with daggers (already factored into her attacks).

actions.description: Nine-Fingers attacks three times with her daggers.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, plus 6 piercing damage if it's a ranged attack.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Aura of Murder
special_abilities.desc: As long as the reaper is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

actions.description: The reaper makes two dagger attacks and uses Shroud Self.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: The reaper magically turns invisible until the start of its next turn. This invisibility ends if the reaper makes an attack roll, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.
actions.name: Shroud Self

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action
special_abilities.desc: On each of her turns in combat, Rilsa can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Focus
special_abilities.desc: If Rilsa damages a creature with a weapon attack, she gains advantage on attack rolls against that target until the end of her next turn.

special_abilities.name: Tactical Leadership
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Rilsa chooses one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. The creature doesn't provoke opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn, provided it can hear Rilsa's commands.

actions.description: Rilsa makes three weapon attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, Smiler can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that he can see or to the empty seat of his infernal war machine.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Smiler has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Smiler wears +2 leather armor. He carries seven soul coins in a bag and a +1 shortsword

actions.description: Smiler makes two weapon attacks. He can cast a spell in place of one of these attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: +1 Shortsword

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Thurstwell is a 2nd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). He has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame (see "Actions" below), thaumaturgy
- 1st level (3 slots): command, detect evil and good, sanctuary

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: Thurstwell has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.description: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature Thurstwell can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) radiant damage, gaining no benefit from cover.
actions.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)

special_abilities.name: Goring Rush
special_abilities.desc: Immediately after using the Dash action, Torogar can make one melee attack with his horns.

special_abilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall
special_abilities.desc: Torogar can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

special_abilities.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc:
As a bonus action, Torogar can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if Torogar is knocked unconscious or if his turn ends and he hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since his last turn. While raging, Torogar gains the following benefits:
He has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
He deals an extra 3 damage when he hits a target with a melee weapon attack.
He has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Torogar wears gauntlets of flaming fury and a belt of fire giant strength. Without the belt, his Strength is 21. He also carries a soul coin.

actions.description: Torogar makes three attacks: two with his scimitars and one with his horns.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage, or 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage while raging, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage from the gauntlets of flaming fury.
actions.name: Scimitar

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage, or 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage while raging.
actions.name: Horns

special_abilities.name: Detect Invisibility
special_abilities.desc: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Poison Sense
special_abilities.desc: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

special_abilities.name: Familiar
special_abilities.desc: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym in stead of a normal cat.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Ulder makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage when used with two hands.
actions.name: +1 Longsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.
actions.name: Shield
